content: Congratulations to all our GSoC 2019 students! Announcement e-mails are still in progress now if not already sent, but we'll be reaching out as well via e-mail. Thank you to all that expressed interest, worked on code, and developed proposals.

Just a reminder to GSoC students -- you should be working on completing the Checklist items this week! Please take care of it as soon as possible. There are a couple critical items on that list that affirm your willingness to participate in GSoC and it's good to get setup out of the way. @Sadeep Darshana @Quentin Paden @Louis Googl (and all others if you're listening here)
